QueryGoal
==================================================

Definition::

    # ====== DO NOT MODIFY! AUTOGENERATED FROM AN ACTION DEFINITION ======
    # Request
    
    string  description # for visualization of the query
    string  grammar # Grammar as specified in the grammar_parser package (https://github.com/tue-robotics/grammar_parser)
    string  target # Target, root of the grammar sub-tree that should be recognized
